# predicate

**Instance Property**

A predicate that defines the set of series samples that the query returns.

## Declaration

```swift
var predicate: HKSamplePredicate<HKQuantitySample>
```

## Accessing Query Properties

- **options**: A set of options for the query. For a list of possible values, see [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantitySeriesSampleQueryDescriptor/Options-swift.struct].

items.description: A set of options for the query. For a list of possible values, see [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantitySeriesSampleQueryDescriptor/Options-swift.struct].
